Value:
{ \
  XBeeTransportPut1Byte(XBEE_START); \
  uint8_t payload_len = XBeeAPISizeOf(_len); \

#define XBeeTransportTrailer (  ) 
Value:
{ \
  xbee_cs = 0xff - xbee_cs; \
